name: Spellbooks
author: cjmcw
notes:
basically a netdeck of Jasonâ€™s build. messed around with lots of techs like chow len and the tricky too. still not sure what the last 2-3 monsters should be, but your combo is to get t1 fate, usually by crescent, but also by fool. then you just recycle with eternity and stun your opponent into oblivion. really fun deck. beat 2 gears, 1 sylvan, 1 Amazon, and 1 masked e hero on my streak.
